pages.text: Are you tired from your adventuring? Maybe it's time to get a Good Night's Sleep? When you have found a Despair Mushroom and a Hope Mushroom you can craft youself a Strange Bed. When it's time to tuck in for some well deserved rest, be aware that you never know if you will have a Good Dream or a Nightmare...
If you have a good dream you come to a land of candy and unicorns.
If you want to be certain you always have a good dream you can craft the Luxurious Bed. The Positite Gem you get from Positite Ore found underground.
The nightmare realm is dark and scary.
If you want to be certain you always have a nightmare you can craft the Wretched Bed. The Negatite Gem you get from Negatite Ore found underground.
